idea: Singshala.com with a company name Lucid music education Pvt ltd is a digital music learning platform. Singshala is an upcoming guided content creation app that enables users to learn how to sing through enhancing the singer’s rhythm and pitch.
name: LUCID MUSIC EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Udyam Prabhat Foundation is a Unique Platform that supports and nurtures a 360-degree growth of MSMEs – In all direction! Our underlying Objective is to Assist SMEs to Prosper. Based out of Mumbai, Varanasi with a presence in Kolkata, Delhi, Lucknow, this young and vibrant organisation comprises of a dynamic leadership team and a very able support team from diverse fields with loads of industry experience and relevant business network.
name: UDYAM PRABHAT FOUNDATION

idea: Shah is a good person. he is very religious and he is very hard working
name: Shah

idea:
Our company Hi-Eff Engineering LLP thus introduced with the aim to manufacture all types of industrial valves under Hi-Eff® brand to cater above industries with the acquired ability to consistently deliver High-Efficiency services.

A product needs a name: a name that people remember and relate to. A product with a brand helps stand out from the cluster of products. A product has to be communicative where potential users must know why they need to use it and what it does different than others. Hi-Eff assure its products functionally adaptable to do what it is supposed to. We have made strides in development and production to be recognized as the most reliable source for all types of valves in India and other countries.
name: HI-EFF ENGINEERING LLP

idea:
At the age of 16, I have achieved a number of accomplishments in all fields - sports, art, music, academics, and entrepreneurial abilities. One of my most recent successes was my excellent result of 97.2% in my grade 10 CBSE board exams, without any tuition classes or extra coaching! Yes, I effectively managed my time, such that I was able to win a cricket tournament days before my prelims, organise and chair MUNs (such as MYS Summit ’19 and Diplomathon ’19), appeared for the Trinity College of London SPD Grade 4, participate in Overture Musical Program 2019, and many other achievements, apart from studying for my boards. I am one of the very few prodigies in India who can top their school with 98% without any tuition classes! I was felicitated by Somaiya Vidyavihar’s president Mr Samir Somaiya, and several local newspapers.


Apart from that, I have had quite some success with my previous startups - MoodDelight and DiceX. I have received a Diploma from the Startup School of India (SSI) and also worked on biotech projects like INTACH and MyoBlast in 2019 and 2020. Currently, I am pursuing the IBDP and also working on several projects, including my own innovation-based startup which will be launched soon! I am indeed one of the very few young achievers, having achieved such feats at such a young age.
name: Tanish Chheda

idea: We are a growing organization in machinery manufacturing for Healthcare like Pharmaceuticals, F&B, Cosmetics & allied sectors. With unmatched quality and innovation, we are the leaders in the industry for delivering high quality products with prompt customer service .Pactech GROUP has manufactured and represented the highest quality machines in the world. Our unwavering commitment to excellence begins by listening to you. Your ideas and our passion for innovation bring our breakthrough technology products to life. Then we test them vigorously. Not in some laboratory, but out in the real world. That’s because we strive for and expect the best..
name: PACTECH MACHINERY LLP

idea:
Teqsys Global Solutions Pvt Ltd (hereafter referred as TEQSYS) was incorporated Mar, 2020. It is self-funded organization. Highly experienced leadership team from global (Japanese/ US) product development companies came together & formed Teqsys Global to build and produce world class IT systems in India.

TEQSYS is a information technology company, engaged in engineering and manufacturing, sales, services exports for datacenter systems (IT Systems) that is servers (enterprise class), data processing storage, purpose build appliances, engineering workstation & software products by the brand name VANTAGEO™.

TEQSYS will stay focus of product development and shall own the designs and IP and manufacture these systems and software though inhouse capacity and also through contract manufacturers in the country and perform the sales of finish goods though TEQSYS Authorised distributors and business partners across the globe.

Products developed by TEQSYS by the brand name VANTAGEO (TM) will be Indian made product (local engineering) which shall certainly reduce the imports of such products from nearby Asian manufacturing countries. And provide a reliable product design, engineered, manufactured and supported locally.

TEQSYS emphasis to augment the local content of engineering and manufacturing of components level by investing in such facilities and infrastructure over the period direct or indirect though Joint venture or technology collaboration.
name: TEQSYS GLOBAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
